entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 03:17 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets changing to rain in the afternoon. Periods of freezing rain inland. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except periods of freezing rain inland early in the evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
